title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Friday 24 July 2015 - BBC News
summary: a father of three who was stabbed to death in his home would have taken `` minutes to die '' a court has heard .
the police federation says a rise in special constables in northamptonshire must not be used to replace regular officers .
northampton town reveal a new pink strip for the 2015-16 football season to help a breast cancer charity .
more news , sport travel and weather from 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: have a good evening and weekend
text: that 's all for today from local live for northamptonshire .
today we 've been looking , a lot , at northampton town 's new pink away .
here it is for one last time .
we 'll back monday from 08:00 .
see you then , have a good weekend .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton town takeover 'progressing really well '
text: northampton town chairman david cardoza
`` the consortium met with northampton borough council on monday and i understand that was a really positive meeting , '' he said .
`` we hope to be able to advise a potential completion date for the takeover shortly , but supporters can be advised that things are very much progressing forwards and are on track . ''
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: cobblers away kit 'really smart '
text: i wanted to get a fashion viewpoint on northampton town 's new pink away kit .
lorna wilshire is a personal stylist based in rushden and she thinks the kit looks 'really smart ' .
she said : `` the pink in the shirt is really shown off by the smart black socks , and the shorts are fantastic with the subtle pink trim .
the colour palette is vibrant and eye-catching and will certainly get them noticed .
it is a lovely energetic and rather flattering shade of pink so it should make them feel good . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

two men reached through a letter-box to set fire to a front-door curtain .
the fire was extinguished promptly and did not cause any injuries .

documents.title: steven smith murder trial : victim had 14cm stab wound
text: i 'm at northampton crown court for the trial of danny beaumont , 27 , who is charged with the murder of his friend steven smith , 23 , who died from knife wounds on october last year .
the pathologist who examined mr smith estimated that he had a 14cm ( 5.5in ) stab wound and told the court he was stabbed in the back and into the heart .
mr beaumont says that the victim `` came at him '' and pushed himself on the knife .
the trial continues .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: steven smith murder trial : victim died in a matter of minutes
text: i 'm back at northampton crown court for the rushden murder trial where danny beaumont , 27 , is charged with murdering steven smith by stabbing him repeatedly in his home in october .
prosecutors say the pair were drinking together and there was a row which resulted in beaumont stabbing the father of three in the chest and in the back , leaving him fatally injured .
today we had medical evidence .
the court heard the stab wound was 14cm ( 5.5in ) deep and mr smith did not die immediately .
the pathologist said that he would have been able to walk and talk right up until the moment he collapsed and died which was a matter of minutes .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton labour nominate yvette cooper
text: last night at its annual general meeting , northampton labour party nominated yvette cooper mp for

councillor rufia ashraf , who was voted in as chairman of the group at the same meeting , said : `` we had many passionate speeches for each of the four leadership candidates and really compelling arguments were put across .
`` in the end it was a close vote , but yvette cooper was nominated for leader .
jeremy corbyn was second . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: new cobblers kit 'best since i started supporting the club '
text: glen cousner emails : `` i love the new kits , in my opinion the home kit is the best since i started supporting the club in 1980 .
i 've just bought both shirts .
normally i 'd only buy one , but my friends and i recently lost a very good friend ( mark gosling ) to cancer .
we used to follow the cobblers all over the country with him .
`` i know that coppafeel [ breast cancer charity ] will benefit from the away shirt sales so i hope as many cobblers fans as possible buy one .
`` i know that many of the large group of friends i travel with , will be buying the pink and having `` gozzer '' printed on the back to remember him in our first season without his ''
let us know what you think of the new cobblers kits .

documents.title: weather warning for northamptonshire
text: the met office have issued
they say that an area of rain and strong to gale force winds is expected to cross much of southern england before clearing to the east on saturday morning .
there is a low likelihood that the system could be intense enough to bring disruptive wind and rain to some parts .

BBC Weather

documents.title: organ donors : modern medicine 'needs assistance '
text: leighton briggs is one of 110 people in northamptonshire currently waiting for a life saving organ transplant .
the uk donor register said people donating organs has fallen for the first time in more than a decade .
leighton , from wellingborough , is waiting for kidney and pancreas transplants .
he told me : `` people go into hospital thinking that modern medicine can make them better , but it ca n't without a bit of assistance . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: no conviction for northants officers in last three years
text: a freedom of information request by the press association has found that at least 309 police officers and police community support officers in the uk have been
northamptonshire police said none of its officers have been found guilty of a criminal offence at court since 2012 .
the force said it would exceed the cost and time limits under

UK

documents.title: specials should not 'replace ' regular police
text: the organisation that represents police officers in the county says a rise in special constables must not used to replace regular officers .
specials are volunteers , but have the same powers as officers .

neil goosey from the police federation in northamptonshire said : `` a special constable should support regular policing but not replace it , if we start to do that we undermine the fabric of policing the county . ''
northamptonshire police is looking to
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: council 'ought to be ashamed ' about sekhemka
text: reading guardian online this morning i came across a robust critique of northampton borough council 's decision to sell the sekhamka statue by arts correspondent jonathan jones .
in the midst of an article
he wrote : `` this week the council said it would gladly sell it again .
it ought to be ashamed .
selling this statue - for £ 16m - was a betrayal of every northamptonshire child 's education , as well as an insult to the intelligence of everyone who lives there . ''
the bbc revealed on tuesday that council leader mary markham
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: number of specials in northamptonshire 'unusual '
text: northamptonshire police currently has 468 specials , but is trying to reach an
he said : `` the majority of forces are cutting the amount of specials they have .
northamptonshire has seen the second largest increase in specials in the last year , and it has more specials relative to the size of it 's force than anywhere else in the country . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton
